Package halo.userinterface.cmdline.cmdExceptions

Provides exceptions for incorrect user input.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
InvalidFlagException Exception that is called if a method is called with a flag that is not specified
InvalidMethodException Exception which is thrown when an invalid method is used
NoValueException Exception which is thrown when no value is given for a flag
 

Package halo.userinterface.cmdline.cmdExceptions Description

Provides exceptions for incorrect user input.
